full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'DOD KHAMS DBANG PHYUG DPAL LDAN LHA MO NAG MO LA TSOGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,ZHES 'DOD KHAMS DBANG PHYUG DPAL LDAN LHA MO NAG MO'I TSOGS MCHOD DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, TU RUNG DZA SAG GI BU CHA MDO SNGAG SKYI CHOS TSUL LA MKHAS PA'I RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA SKU SKYES YANG ZER BA'I CHOS RJE THO YON SLOB BU DGE SLONG SKAL BZANG RDO RJES BSKUL MA MDZAD PA'I NGOR, DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI KHUNGS THUB KYI TSOGS MCHOD DU MA LA LEGS PAR GZHIGS TE GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU BTZUN GZUGS DZNY'A NA MING CAN GYIS YI GER 'DU BYED @007B DO, ,'DIS MTSON DANG GZHAN GYI RNAM DKAR DGE BAS, BLA MA YI DAM MA DANG MKHA' 'GRO CHOS SKYONG BSRUNG MA RNAMS KYIS DUS DANG GNAS SKABS THAMS CAD DU THUGS BRTZE BA CHEN POS RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,
